groups.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common
groups.description: Common Library configuration properties for all modules and components.

groups.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.banner
groups.description: Configuration properties for customizing the application banner.

groups.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain
groups.description: Configuration properties for domain layer components including entities, repositories, and services.

groups.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity
groups.description: Configuration properties for entity behavior and auditing.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.banner.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the custom banner. When enabled, a custom banner will be displayed during application startup.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.banner.location
properties.description: Path to the custom banner resource file. Can be an absolute path or a classpath resource (e.g., 'classpath:custom-banner.txt').

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.banner.color
properties.description: Text color of the banner. Supports ANSI color names for terminal output customization.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity.enable-auditing
properties.description: Enable or disable automatic entity auditing. When enabled, creation and modification timestamps and user information will be automatically tracked.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity.system-username
properties.description: Default username to use for system actions when no user is authenticated. This will be recorded in audit fields for changes made by background processes.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity.enable-soft-delete
properties.description: Enable or disable soft delete functionality. When enabled, entities will be marked as deleted instead of physically removed from the database.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity.lifecycle-events-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable entity lifecycle events. When enabled, events will be published for entity creation, update, and deletion operations.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.repository.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable custom repository functionality. Controls whether the repository auto-configuration is applied.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.service.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable service layer auto-configuration. Controls whether the service auto-configuration is applied.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.service.enable-validation
properties.description: Enable validation at service layer. When enabled, entities will be validated before saving using Bean Validation.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.controller.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable generic controllers. Controls whether the controller auto-configuration is applied.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.controller.base-path
properties.description: Base path for REST endpoints. This path will be prepended to all controller endpoints.
